member.summary: Gets CLR types that are used as the content of or .

member.summary: Gets the objects that are used directly as samples for certain actions.

member.summary: Gets the objects that are serialized as samples by the supported formatters.

member.name: P:PublicApi.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.summary: This represents an invalid sample on the help page. There's a display template named InvalidSample associated with this class.

member.name: T:PublicApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator
member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:PublicApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:PublicApi.Areas.HelpPage.SampleDirection
member.summary: Indicates whether the sample is used for request or response

member.name: T:PublicApi.Areas.HelpPage.TextSample
member.summary: This represents a preformatted text sample on the help page. There's a display template named TextSample associated with this class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:PublicApi.Controllers.OpenController
member.summary: The OpenController is the public interface that can tell whether or not a given institution is open.

member.name: M:PublicApi.Controllers.OpenController.#ctor(Data.Services.IShiftService)
member.summary: Dependency injection constructor of OpenController

member.name: M:PublicApi.Controllers.OpenController.IsOpen(System.String)
member.summary: Find out whether or not the institution identified by short key is open based on whether or not any employee has checked in.
member.param: The short key of the institution.

member.name: T:PublicApi.Controllers.ShiftsController
member.summary: The ShiftsController is the public entrance to get opening hour and shift information.

member.name: M:PublicApi.Controllers.ShiftsController.#ctor(Data.Services.IShiftService,PublicApi.Mapping.IOpeningHoursMapper)
member.summary: Dependency injection constructor.

member.name: M:PublicApi.Controllers.ShiftsController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Fetch shifts for the next week for a given institution.
member.param: ShortKey of the institution to fetch opening hours for.
member.returns: A collection of OpeningHoursDTO. NotFound if institutionRepository was not found.

member.name: M:PublicApi.Controllers.ShiftsController.GetIntervals(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fetch shifts for the next week for a given institution.
member.param: ShortKey of the institution to fetch opening hours for.
The number of minutes an interval should span.
member.returns: A collection of IntervalOpeningHoursDTO. NotFound if institutionRepository was not found.

member.name: T:PublicApi.Controllers.EmployeesController
member.summary: The public API to access employee information for institutions.

member.name: M:PublicApi.Controllers.EmployeesController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Retrive all employees for a given institution.
member.returns: A collection of employees, if the institution was found. Http 404 otherwise.

member.name: M:PublicApi.Controllers.EmployeesController.Get(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve a certain employee from an institution.
member.returns: A representation of the employee, if a shortKey/id match was found.

member.name: M:PublicApi.Controllers.EmployeesController.GetPhoto(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve the photo for an employee.
member.returns: A photo if the shortkey/id match was found. Http 404 otherwise. If the employee has no photo registered, an empty response is generated.

member.name: T:PublicApi.Mapping.IOpeningHoursMapper
member.summary: Mapper interface for opening hour classes and DTOs.

member.name: M:PublicApi.Mapping.IOpeningHoursMapper.MapToDto(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Data.Models.Shift})
member.summary: Maps a collection of Shifts into a collection of OpeningHoursDTOs.
